scripts.d-all: concurrently "npm:dev -C core" "npm:dev -C payment" "npm:dev -C order" "npm:dev -C review" "npm:dev -C cart" "npm:dev -C item" "npm:dev -C gateway"
scripts.i-all: (cd core && npm i) && (cd ../payment && npm i) && (cd ../order && npm i) && (cd ../review && npm i) && (cd ../cart && npm i) && (cd ../item && npm i)  && (cd ../gateway && npm i)
scripts.s-all: concurrently "npm:start -C core" "npm:start -C payment" "npm:start -C order" "npm:start -C review" "npm:start -C cart" "npm:start -C item" "npm:start -C gateway"
